Home » 38P2 Dhammānuloma (1), Dukapaṭṭhānapāḷi (2) » 4 Saññojanagocchaka » 4.3 Saññojanasampayuttaduka » 4.3.1 Paṭiccavāra » 4.3.1.1 Paccayānuloma » 4.3.1.1.1 Vibhaṅgavāra
Adhipati
Saññojanagocchaka
Saññojanasampayuttaduka
Paṭiccavāra
Paccayānuloma
Vibhaṅgavāra
Adhipati
45.
1434Saññojanasampayuttaṃ dhammaṃ paṭicca saññojanasampayutto dhammo uppajjati adhipatipaccayā…  tīṇi.
1435Saññojanavippayuttaṃ dhammaṃ paṭicca saññojanavippayutto dhammo uppajjati adhipatipaccayā…  ekaṃ.
1436Saññojanasampayuttañca saññojanavippayuttañca dhammaṃ paṭicca saññojanavippayutto dhammo uppajjati adhipatipaccayā—  saññojanasampayuttake khandhe ca mahābhūte ca paṭicca cittasamuṭṭhānaṃ rūpaṃ. (1) (Saṃkhittaṃ.)
